packages.name: Package Deal #1
packages.description: This package has the basic essentials for your backyard party.
packages.details: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper, 3 6' children's tables, 24 children chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

packages.name: Package Deal #2
packages.description: This package meets all your cotton candy needs and includes a basic jumper.
packages.details: Includes: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper and 1 cotton candy machine with 100 servings.

packages.name: Package Deal #3
packages.description: This package meets all your popcorn needs and includes a basic jumper.
packages.details: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper and 1 popcorn machine with 100 servings.

packages.name: Package Deal #4
packages.description: This package meets all your snowcone needs and includes a basic jumper.
packages.details: Includes: 1 13' x 13' jumper, 1 snow cone machine, 3 syrup flavors, 100 spoon straws, and 100 snow cone cones. PLEASE NOTE: ice is not included.

packages.name: Package Deal #5
packages.description: Enjoy 2 different types of margarita flavors.
packages.details: Includes: 2 sigle bowl margarita machines, 2 frozen margarita flavors, 100 9oz. tumblers, and 1 margarita salt rimmer.

packages.name: Package Deal #6
packages.description: A guaranteed fun party with cotton candy, a jumper, and essentials provided.
packages.details: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper, 1 cotton candy machine with 100 servings, 3 6' children's tables, 24 children's chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

packages.name: Package Deal #7
packages.details: Includes: 1 55cf helium tank, 75 balloons, 1 balloon ribbon roll, and 1 helium tilt adaptor. PLEASE NOTE:

packages.name: Package Deal #8
packages.details: Includes: 1 helium tank 110CF., 200 latex balloons 11', 1 ribbon roll 350yd., and 1 tilt helium adaptor. PLEASE NOTE:

packages.name: Package Deal #9
packages.description: This package includes the basic essentials for your backyard party.
packages.details: Includes: one 4 in 1 combo, 3 6' tables, 24 white samsonite chairs, and 12 helium balloons.
